attributes.action: explain why some local learn direct centres are being closed and ruining peoples'chances of retraining when at this time retraining is part of government policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our local Learn Direct centre in Harleston Norfolk is to close on March 6th. The nearest centres then will be Yarmouth or Thetford each some 20 - 25 miles away . The clientele for Harleston come from within 8 miles . My own retraining has been sabotaged as has that of many other people . Those who attend such courses are the ones determined to work yet at a time when your government hopes to rely on training /retraining this seems a complete non-sequitur
